verses.verse: I <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because he <S%H8085>listens<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and my cries for <S%H8469>mercy.<s%>
Because he has <S%H5186>turned<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7121>me,<s%> therefore I will call on him as long as I <S%H3117>live.<s%>

The <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>surrounded<s%> <S%H4712>me,<s%> the pains of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> got a <S%H4672>hold<s%> of <S%H4672>me.<s%> I found <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>
Then I <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> I <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H4422>you,<s%> deliver my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H6612>simple.<s%> I was brought <S%H1809>low,<s%> and he saved <S%H3467>me.<s%>
<S%H7725>Return<s%> to your <S%H4494>rest,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has dealt bountifully with <S%H1580>you.<s%>
For you have <S%H2502>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1832>tears,<s%> and my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling.<s%>
I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
What will I <S%H7725>give<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for all his benefits toward <S%H8408>me?<s%>
I will <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5971>yes,<s%> in the presence of all his people.
<S%H3368>Precious<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is the <S%H4194>death<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H577>truly<s%> I am your <S%H5650>servant.<s%> I am your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid.<s%> You have <S%H6605>freed<s%> me from my <S%H4147>chains.<s%>
I will <S%H2076>offer<s%> to you the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5971>yes,<s%> in the presence of all his people,
in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>you,<s%> Jerusalem. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
